sentences.en: An art historian and collector, he was also a practising architect.
sentences.cn: 他身为艺术历史学家和收藏家，同时也是一名从业建筑师。

sentences.en: But I am an architect.
sentences.cn: 但是我是一名建筑师。

sentences.en: Call in an architect or surveyor to oversee the work.
sentences.cn: 找个建筑师或监理员来监工。

sentences.en: James Madison was the principal architect of the constitution.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯·麦迪逊是该宪法的主设计师。

sentences.en: One of the first things we did when we moved in, to the chagrin of the architect, was to replace the leaded windows.
sentences.cn: 让建筑师大为懊恼的是，我们搬进去最先做的事情之一就是换掉了花饰铅条窗。

sentences.en: Perhaps I want to be an architect .
sentences.cn: 也许我想成为一名建筑师。

sentences.en: Ricardo Bofill, the Catalan architect, has designed the revamped airport.
sentences.cn: 里卡多·博菲利是一名加泰罗尼亚的建筑师，这座整修过的机场就是他设计的。

sentences.en: Sir James was an immensely distinguished architect in the vanguard of his profession.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯爵士是一位非常杰出的建筑师，处于其专业领域的前沿位置。

sentences.en: The architect specified oak for the wood trim.
sentences.cn: 那位建筑师指定用橡木做木饰条.

sentences.en: The architect would often just write something like "beautiful fretwork" on the drawing.
sentences.cn: 建筑师通常只会在图上写著“美丽的浮凸雕工”之类的说明。

sentences.en: The architect's piece de resistance was the City Opera House.
sentences.cn: 这位建师的最得意之作是市歌剧院.

sentences.en: The building was constructed from the design of that architect.
sentences.cn: 这幢大楼是按那位建筑师的设计建造的.

sentences.en: The commission for the new theatre was given to a well - known architect.
sentences.cn: 建造新剧院之权已委托给一位著名的建筑师.

sentences.en: The master architect of disaster was our neighbor country.
sentences.cn: 这场灾难的罪魁祸首是我们的邻国.

sentences.en: The new building embodied the idea of the architect.
sentences.cn: 这个新建的大厦具体表现了这位建筑师的思想.

sentences.en: The new building was built from the design of a famous architect.
sentences.cn: 这座新楼是根据一位著名建筑师的设计建成的.

sentences.en: The Taylors decided that they would employ an architect to do the work.
sentences.cn: 泰勒家决定雇个建筑师来干这个活。

sentences.en: The work of an architect of genius always arrests the attention no matter how little remains.
sentences.cn: 天才建筑师的作品无论残留多少都能最大限度地吸引眼球。

sentences.en: They commissioned an architect to design the new library.
sentences.cn: 他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。

sentences.en: Tinoco was one of the architects of the government’s economic reforms.
sentences.cn: 蒂诺科是政府经济改革的设计师之一。

words.tran_cn: 建筑术的；组织的；知识体系的
建筑学的；建筑上的；符合建筑法的
建筑学；建筑风格；建筑式样

phrases.tran_cn: n. 造园技师；环境美化设计家
系统架构师；系统结构设计员

trans.tran_cn: 建筑师，设计师，规划者，发起者，创立者
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to design buildings
